subject: Running 1 out N testcases
msgSnippet: I have a testsuite which contains multiple testcases. Is it possible to run a single test by passing a command-line option ? Otherwise I have to manually
messageBody:
I have a testsuite which contains multiple testcases. Is it possible
to run a single test by passing a command-line option ?

Otherwise I have to manually comment/uncomments the testcases and
recompile the code. This is quite inefficient.

-Arun
